description: A chai plugin for validate json schema.
name: chai-json-schema-ajv

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-v4 && npm run test-v5 && npm run test-v6 && npm run test-v7 && npm run test-v8 && npm run test-latest
scripts.test-latest: npm i ajv@latest --no-save && nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-node6: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/app -w /app node:6-alpine npm i eslint@6 --no-save && npm test
scripts.test-node8: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/app -w /app node:8-alpine npm i eslint@6 --no-save && npm test
scripts.test-v4: npm i ajv@4 --no-save && AJV_VERSION=v4 nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-v5: npm i ajv@5 --no-save && AJV_VERSION=v5 nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-v6: npm i ajv@6 --no-save && AJV_VERSION=v6 nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-v7: npm i ajv@7 --no-save && AJV_VERSION=v7 nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-v8: npm run test-v8-default && npm run test-v8-2019 && npm run test-v8-2020
scripts.test-v8-2019: npm i ajv@8 --no-save && AJV_VERSION=v8-2019 nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-v8-2020: npm i ajv@8 --no-save && AJV_VERSION=v8-2020 nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-v8-default: npm i ajv@8 --no-save && AJV_VERSION=v8 nyc mocha test/unit
